predicate.note: Frames file for 'overpower' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: the one example
example.text: As Ruth, Moira Harris, a large and beautiful woman who may be our next Colleen Dewhurst, begins almost immediately [*-2] to overpower each of the men.
example.arg: [*-2] -> Moira Harris, a large and beautiful woman who may be our next Colleen Dewhurst,
